name: Braking Bad
description:
Braking bad is an arcade time trial racing game, where you race against the clock to get the best time possible - without any brakes.

Chose your Difficulty and try to hit the top of the leaderboards in the online competition, or just try to beat your own high-score.

Featuring 5 maps - 20 planned in later updates, with multiplayer planned and many more other features on their way!

Support Pinkuin Game Studios:

Buy me a coffee.
